Mine Sweeper is a game where you have to find the mines hidden in a grid.\nClick on a cell to open it and reveal its content.

The opened cell contains a mine or a number.
If you open a cell with a mine the game is over.
If the cell contains a number, that number indicates how many mines are located on the 8 cells around it.
If there are no mines around it, no number is displayed.
When you detect that under a cell a mine is located, you can mark it with long press on the cell.\nThe marked cells cannot be opened.\nYou can un mark cells long pressing them again

The game finishes when you step on a mine or all of the cells that do not contain mines are opened.\nRemember that Mine Sweeper is a logical game, thus brute force will only help you in rare occasions.\nGood luck!
